item.title: Baked French Fries
item.description: Ingredients 4 large baking potatoes 2-3 tablespoons olive oil salt and pepper and thyme Directions wash potatoes, peel if desired, cut into preferred fry shape rinse and soak in a large bowl for 30 minutes preheat oven to 375 degrees drain water from potatoes and dry toss with oil and seasoning spread in a single layer on parchment paper lined baking sheet bake for 20 minutes increase heat to 425 degrees and bake for another 20 minutes
